channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- Remote
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- Remote

item.title: CVE-2023-0837|2023-06-14T07:01:10.595Z -- teamviewer -- remote
item.description: An improper authorization check of local device settings in TeamViewer Remote between version 15.41 and 15.42.7 for Windows and macOS allows an unprivileged user to change basic local device settings even though the options were locked. This can result in unwanted changes to the configuration.
